full_description: 依次执行: click_alarmclock, click_bell. click the alarm clock's center of the top side button on the table Then click the <bell's top center> on the table
schema: Task1: {A} notifies the alarm clock, {a} notifies the arm to click the alarm clock; Task2: {A} notifies the bell, {a} notifies the arm to click the bell
preference: num of words should not exceed 25
seen: Complete the combined task: 依次执行: click_alarmclock, click_bell
Step 1: {a} clicks the center top button on {A}
Step 2: Press <bell's top center> using {a} on the table
